extendedInfo.description: You must first install the EZ Usenet application (FREE!) and be a member of Easynews.com to use this Unlock. Purchasing this application will unlock the 14 days restrictions from the EZ Usenet application.Once you install this application, shutdown EZ Usenet, and re-launch the application. EZ Usenet will automatically detect this Unlock application and verify your license.If you are still having problems, try rebooting your device and/or uninstall and re-install EZ Usenet.

reviews.title: Unlock doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I have the unlocked version, but the program still thinks I have the free version... pretty sucky!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app!!! Use it with mobo player on my evo, can download and watch movies on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: I paired for this app and it keep telling me I need to upgrade to paied version, I have jelly bean on galaxy s3 , I had the free version of the app and the purchased one, some downloads work some say \" this post is older tan 150days you need to upgrade\" please fix
reviews.author: Emil Vasile

reviews.title: Unlocks most ofvthevtime.
reviews.comment: Validation seems 2 be primary issue but great app when it works
reviews.author: Anthony Acosta

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: TOTAL RIPOFF WONT EVEN SHOW UP ON A ROOTED GALAXY S3
reviews.author: james schroeder

reviews.title: Great but,...
reviews.comment: Works great, would be easier if the unlock would pre populate the login credentials. Also needs an update for shazam.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unlock does not work and there is no way to contact the developer. Also says no refunds after 15 min. I bought it last night and tried it this a.m.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unlock DOES NOT WORK!
reviews.comment: Fix it, or refund my money. Immediately!
reviews.author: Robert Broadhead

reviews.title: Restricted usenet provider
reviews.comment: You cannot specify your own usenet provider. You can only use their partner \"easynews\" do not buy this application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works as advertised
reviews.comment: excellent job of developing the app. 4G Slide and G-Slate. enter your username and password once, then just start the app to have access to the entire usenet, with all of the easynews benefits.  if you are an easynews subscriber, you have to get this. period.
reviews.author: A Google User
